text: kya jis shakhs ne khuda ke khauph aur khushanoodee par apanee imaarat kee buniyaad daalee ho vah jyaada achchha hai ya vah shakhs jisane apanee imaarat kee buniyaad is bode kinaare ke lab par rakhee ho jisamen daraar pad chukee ho aur agar vah chaahata ho phir use le de ke jahannum kee aag mein phat pade aur khuda zaalim logon ko manzilen maqasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata
